assertion.value: All authors’ surnames and given names had been swapped.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Patients gave informed consent to genetic analyses and research. This study is a retrospective study based on the exploitation of usual care data. A submission at an ethic committee is not required according to the French ethic and regulatory law (public health code).
